title: How to Survive a Long Distance Relationship and Prepare for Marriage
description:
Long distance dating is hard. Especially if you are a quality time person. How can you transition to engagement if you’re not even in the same city? What should you know before saying I Do? In this special episode Jordan walks through these questions and more with her good friend, author, podcaster, and non-scripted television series star, Audrey Roloff. Listen in as the women discuss how to be single, yet searching, tips to navigate the tricky waters of long distance dating, and why there are still ‘good men’ out there. If you’re single, ready for engagement, or prepping for the wedding day, this episode is here to help refine your head and heart to prepare for your next life season.

Preorder your copy of Jordan's Own Your Everyday book here: jordanleedooley.com/book

Then, grab your OYE bonuses here: jordanleedooley.com/oye-bonuses

Check out Audrey's new book, A Love Letter Life at ALoveLetterLife.com!
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
